casebody.data:
William R. CIPRIANO, Petitioner, v. DEPARTMENT OF THE ARMY, Respondent. No. 04-3306. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. May 9, 2005.

Before LOURIE, Circuit Judge, ARCHER, Senior Circuit Judge, and GAJARSA, Circuit Judge.

*159 JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is

ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 86.
